ing: 1 (2 pound) package powdered chocolate drink mix
1 (8 ounce) jar powdered coffee creamer, or more to taste
des: "I learned hot to make this in college -- so that is what, 43 years ago? Something like that. Prepackaged dry hot chocolate mix such as you get in the grocery store is way, way expensive. And 43 years ago I don't believe Swiss MissÂ® existed as a product anyway. This recipe is much less expensive per serving; makes an enormous amount of mix and makes a great Christmas gift."
ins: Stir powdered milk, chocolate drink mix, confectioners' sugar, and coffee creamer together in a large container or bowl.
